channel.title: AroxRSPS | The RSPS For You
channel.description:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/1U0GW[/img]
[url=http://www.aroxrsps.com]Website[/url] [/center]
[b]Introduction:[/b] Hello there. I know it's been a while since I've been around the RSPS scene as a developer but I've had some comments thrown my way lately and I'd like to change the way people see me as that. I was approached recently by GooRoo and asked if I wanted to be his website developer and after seeing the media I think we have a good base to build on. Between the development team we have a past server player count of over a thousand so I'm sure we can pull something together. AroxRSPS isn't just another server, we may not have top-of-the-range custom content and the most talented programmers but we do have experience and a good base to work from, our client is unmatched, we just need server work done which will be done in time.
We aim to have this out of development in around a month but we all have rather unpredictable schedules and finding the time to work it all in is a little difficult. We do have a VPS and webhost provided by Anthony, who happens to own his own hosting company therefore server costs aren't an issue in the early stages. We do plan on being a rather large server and we do have a few tricks up our sleeve to keep Jagex at bay, at least for a while.
[b]Development Team:[/b] Me - Administrator and Website Developer. GooRoo (xElite) - Administrator and Java Developer. Anthony - Administrator and Java Developer. Loveandpower - Administrator and Java Developer.
[b]Current Server & Client Features/Media[/b]: - 4 World Support - Fully working login lobby - Fullscreen, re-sizable and fixed components - Custom interfaces - Perfected combat - [b]All[/b] skills trainable - 600+ data(objects, items) - Perfect 508 maps - Somewhat of a music system [center] Client/Server Media: [img]http://puu.sh/1U0Y2[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1U0ZD[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1U11M[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1U13G[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1UvXf[/img] [/center]
We will be adding updates daily, or as close to daily as possible. Arox has been in development underground for quite some time, a number of months in fact. It was only at my suggestion that we made the development public so that people know our name. We can grow to something unbelievable as long as you help us towards that. If you have any suggestions you can post them below or go ahead and go straight to our website where you can suggest them directly to the full development team.
Regards, Ruby.

item.title: AroxRSPS | The RSPS For You
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:34, topic:480663”]i swear your working and like loads of different servers?

OT: I think you should just use a real 614[/quote]
I hadn’t touched a server for a year~ before this one. This was one big mistake, shouldn’t have even bothered going near it with idiots. The only other server I’m working on is Tartarus, and there’s not much I can do right now until we need a site.

I do have a lot of projects though, since I’m a web developer I’m not limited to just RSPS, everyone and anything could need a website. I have 4/5~ projects at the minute, that’s probably why my name keeps cropping up.

However, this has ended. I think someone continued it but it certainly wasn’t me.

Read full topic

item.title: AroxRSPS | The RSPS For You
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

There hasn’t been very many updates server-sided today, we’ve been rather busy.

Matched our ranking system in-game to my staff concept
Added an infraction/black-mark system

I’ve also started developing server-side, I’m not much of a java programmer but it’s only basic stuff like re-writing skills so I only needed to know the basics.

We should be pushing website-server integration tomorrow or the next day.

item.title: AroxRSPS | The RSPS For You
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

LOL, yeah. We weren’t hacked through any exploit in SMF, that’s not the case. One of our administrators Gooroo was keylogged by the owner of Elvarg and he changed a few settings in our ACP and that was that. I came on for 5 minutes and had it fixed, it’s nothing to worry about. I’m glad he done it now and not later on when we have a player-base to lose.

The same person tried to tell me he could hack any SMF database in the world (obviously not) and is trying to pass his little keylog off as a full blown hacking process. What an idiot.

Read full topic
